title: Hour 2: Dak Overrated?
description:
Jay Williams, Chris Russo, and Domonique Foxworth debate whether Kevin Durant or Donovan Mitchell is the more attractive trade option. The guys discuss if they are surprised that Lamar Jackson is not ranked as one of the top 10 QBs in the NFL. Jay and Chris talk about whether or not they are disappointed that Aaron Judge will not be participating in the upcoming Home Run Derby. Stick around to hear Chris and Domonique Foxworth discuss if Dak Prescott is overrated.
